P

Packet - Class in packets
An abstract Packet class to be extended into data-packets to be interpreted by client and server.
Packet(int) - Constructor for class packets.Packet
Constructor for Packet, the packetId is interpreted to decide which type of PacketType is being created.
Packet.PacketTypes - Enum in packets
Types of Packet available are (-1) for INVALID, (00) for LOGIN, (01) for DISCONNECT, (02) for MOVE, (03)for SHOOT and (04) for HIT.(
Packet00Login - Class in packets
A login Packet to enable players to connect their player to the server which forwards it to the connected clients.
Packet00Login(byte[]) - Constructor for class packets.Packet00Login
Constructor for Packet00Login.
Packet00Login(String, double, double, double) - Constructor for class packets.Packet00Login
Constructor for Packet00Login.
Packet01Disconnect - Class in packets
A disconnect Packet to enable players to disconnect their player from the server which forwards it to the connected clients.
Packet01Disconnect(byte[]) - Constructor for class packets.Packet01Disconnect
Constructor for Packet01Disconnect.
Packet01Disconnect(String) - Constructor for class packets.Packet01Disconnect
Constructor for Packet01Disconnect.
Packet02Move - Class in packets
A move Packet to enable players to update the position of their player to the server which forwards it to the connected clients.
Packet02Move(byte[]) - Constructor for class packets.Packet02Move
Constructor for Packet02Move.
Packet02Move(String, double, double, double) - Constructor for class packets.Packet02Move
Constructor for Packet02Move.
Packet03Shoot - Class in packets
A Shoot Packet to enable players to update the server that it has fired a shot, which will then be created by the server to all connected clients.
Packet03Shoot(byte[]) - Constructor for class packets.Packet03Shoot
Constructor for Packet03Shoot.
Packet03Shoot(double, double, double) - Constructor for class packets.Packet03Shoot
Constructor for Packet03Shoot.
Packet04Hit - Class in packets
A Hit Packet to enable players to update the server that it has hit another player and the amount of damage said player will take, which will then be created by the server to all connected clients.
Packet04Hit(byte[]) - Constructor for class packets.Packet04Hit
Constructor for Packet04Hit.
Packet04Hit(String, int) - Constructor for class packets.Packet04Hit
Constructor for Packet04Hit.
packetId - Variable in class packets.Packet
 
packets - package packets
 
Player - Class in spacegame
A player class for the game.
Player(int, String) - Constructor for class spacegame.Player
A player for a future single player version of the game.
Player(String, double, double, double, double) - Constructor for class spacegame.Player
A player for a future single player version of the game.
PlayerMP - Class in spacegame
A multiplayer instance of the Player class which it extends.
PlayerMP(String, double, double, double, double, InetAddress, int) - Constructor for class spacegame.PlayerMP
Constructs an PlayerMP with a specified name, TranslateX, TranslateY, Rotate, double Speed, InetAddress and a port.
